response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. This product holds immense worth to me, reflecting years of dedication and investment. Given its exceptional quality and potential impact, I am offering it to you at a special price of $2,000,000. This represents a significant premium over its intrinsic value, aimed at ensuring a fair return on my investment while providing you with an unparalleled opportunity.

Please consider this offer carefully. If you are interested in discussing further details or exploring how this product can benefit you, I would be more than happy to arrange a meeting or a call at your convenience. Should you decide to proceed, we can work together to finalize the transaction swiftly and efficiently.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 2000000}
